tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE forecasting (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    prediction_year INT,
    prediction_month INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(12, 2),
    expenses DECIMAL(12, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE BudgetData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(255),
  budget_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  year INT
)

CREATE TABLE ForecastData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  forecast_date DATE,
  predicted_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  model_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE FraudDetection (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id INT,
  suspected_fraud BOOLEAN,
  fraud_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Expenses ( 
	expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	budget_id UUID REFERENCES Budget(budget_id), 
	expense_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	expense_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
	expense_date DATE NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions ( 
	transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	department_id UUID REFERENCES Department(department_id), 
	transaction_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL, 
	transaction_date DATE NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE Fraudulent_Activities ( 
	activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	department_id UUID REFERENCES Department(department_id), 
	activity_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	activity_description TEXT, 
	activity_date DATE NOT NULL 
);
